practice.method: Lie down, relax, stay aware as fall asleep ‚Äî note imagery/insights
practice.timing: Afternoon nap ideal (less sleep pressure than night)

consistency.rule: Same bedtime and wake time EVERY day (including weekends)
consistency.reason: Strengthens circadian rhythm, improves sleep quality

light_management.morning: Bright light (sunlight best) first 30 min after waking ‚Üí anchors circadian clock

evening.screens: Avoid 1-2h before bed; if necessary: night mode + distance + blue blockers

temperature.bedroom: 16-19¬∞C (60-67¬∞F) optimal ‚Äî body needs to drop core temp for sleep

alcohol.effect: Sedation ‚â† sleep; suppresses REM, fragments sleep
alcohol.timing: Finish 3-4h before bed minimum (better: avoid evening)
alcohol.rebound: Second half of night = disturbed, REM rebound, early waking

thc_cannabis.acute: Faster sleep onset, may increase SWS, suppresses REM
thc_cannabis.chronic: Tolerance develops, withdrawal = severe insomnia, REM rebound nightmares

sleeping_pills.problem: Sedation ‚â† natural sleep; don't produce full architecture

exercise.benefits: Deeper SWS, faster sleep onset, better quality

food_timing.helpful: Magnesium, tryptophan-rich foods (turkey, pumpkin seeds, dairy)

pre_sleep_ritual.purpose: Signal to body: time to transition ‚Üí activates parasympathetic

wind_down.activities: Read (paper book, not screen), gentle stretching, meditation, bath, journaling

brain_dump.method: Write down: tomorrow's tasks, worries, thoughts ‚Äî externalizes mental load

children_3_12yr.sws: Higher than adults ‚Äî growth, learning consolidation
